Installation of the cvec-Package cvec
To install this package (after extracting the packages archive file to the GAP pkg directory) go to the directory cvec (the directory containing this README file) and call
./configure [path]
where path is a path to the main GAP root directory (if not given, the default ../.. is assumed).
Afterwards call
make
to compile a binary file.
If you installed GAP on several architectures, you must execute this configure/make step on each of the architectures immediately after configuring GAP itself on this architecture.
The package will not work without this step.
The README file in the main package directory also explains how to compile the kernel function into a static module.
By default the cvec is not automatically loaded by &GAP; when it is installed. You must load the package with LoadPackage("cvec"); before its functions become available.
